name: 微積分甲（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【MAU0178  微積分甲（一）】 ◎課程開放上修
description: 本課程目標是在銜接高中數學，並做為其他高等數學課程的基礎。內容主要介紹函數的極限概念、連續性、微分與積分方法、以及在數學與相關學科上的應用。課程的呈現為理論與方法並重，在假設實數系之基本性質的基礎之上，建立一個完整的體系。
goals: 增進數學分析基本概念的理解
增進邏輯推理與歸納的能力
增進數學思維與批判性思考的能力
進專業知識及追求真理的態度
syllabus:
Syllabus for Calculus A (II), Spring 2022 

The sections with \* are supplementary. 

Week 1 (2/14(ㄧ) or 2/15(二),  2/17(四)) 

*   11.5 Alternating Series and Absolute Convergence 
*   11.6 The Ratio and Root Tests
*   11.8 Power Series

Week 2 (2/21(ㄧ) or 2/22(二),  2/24(四)) 

*   11.9 Representations of Functions as Power Series
*   11.10 Taylor and Maclaurin Series
*   2/24（四）統一考試 (sec 5.5, 7.1~7.5, 7.8)

Week 3 (2/28(ㄧ)放假 or 3/1(二),  3/3(四)) 

*   11.11 Applications of Taylor Polynomials
*   10.1 Curves Defined by Parametric Equations 
*   10.2. Calculus with Parametric Curves 

Week 4 (3/7(ㄧ) or 3/8(二),  3/10(四)) 

*   10.3 Polar Coordinates 
*   10.4 Calculus in Polar Coordinates 
*   \*10.5 Conic Sections 
*   \*10.6 Conic Sections in Polar Coordinates 
*   \*12.1~12.5
*   12.6 Cylinders and Quadric Surfaces 

Week 5 (3/14(ㄧ) or 3/15(二),  3/17(四)) 

*   13.1 Vector Functions and Space Curves 
*   13.2 Derivatives and Integrals of Vector Functions 
*   13.3 Arc Length and Curvature 
*   13.4 Motion in Space: Velocity and Acceleration 

Week 6 (3/21(ㄧ) or 3/22(二),  3/24(四)) 

*   14.1 Functions of Several Variables 
*   14.2 Limits and Continuity 
*   14.3 Partial Derivatives 

Week 7 (3/28(ㄧ) or 3/29(二),  3/31(四)) 

*    14.4 Tangent Planes and Linear Approximations
*    14.5 The Chain Rule

Week 8 (4/5(ㄧ) or 4/6(二) 春假 ,  4/7(四)) 

**期中考**

Week 9 (4/11(ㄧ) or 4/12(二),  4/14 (四))

*   14.7 Maximum and Minimum Values 

Week 10 (4/18(ㄧ) or 4/19(二),  4/21 (四))

*   14.8 Lagrange Multipliers 
*   15.1 Double Integrals over Rectangles
*   15.2 Double Integrals over General Regions 

Week 11 (4/25(ㄧ) or 4/26(二),  4/28 (四))

*   \*15.4 Applications of Double Integrals 
*   15.5 Surface Area 
*   15.6 Triple Integrals 

Week 12 (5/2(ㄧ) or 5/3(二),  5/5 (四))

*   15.7 Triple Integrals in Cylindrical Coordinates 
*   15.8 Triple Integrals in Spherical Coordinates 
*   15.9 Change of Variables in Multiple Integrals 

 Week 13 (5/9(ㄧ) or 5/10(二),  5/12 (四))

Week 15 (5/23(ㄧ) or 5/24(二),  5/26 (四))

*   16.8 Stokes’ Theorem 
*   16.9 The Divergence Theorem 

Week 16 (5/30(ㄧ) or 5/31(二),  6/2 (四))
